alert.note: Alert for Lumpkin; Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:35AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Towns, northeastern Lumpkin, northern White and southeastern Union Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 135 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Turners Corner, or 8 miles northwest of Cleveland, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helen, Unicoi State Park, Whitley Gap Shelter, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Brasstown Bald, Woods Hole Shelter, Low Gap Shelter, Camp Coleman Lake, Vogel State Park, Track Rock, Anna Ruby Falls, Smithgall Woods Conservation Are, Porter Springs, Turners Corner, Blood Mountain Shelter, Sautee and Qualatchee Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
